metadata.title: CVE-2022-40159 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** This record was originally reported by the oss-fuzz projectwho failed to consider the security context in which JXPath is intended tobe used and failed to contact the JXPath maintainers prior to requestingthe CVE allocation. The CVE was then allocated by Google in breach of theCNA rules. After review by the JXPath maintainers, the original report wasfound to be invalid.

criterions.comment: libcommons-jxpath-java package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
